      io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.extension.drawer.EposCashDrawerExtension> getSelectedExtension()
      Method returns actual selected extension. Extension can be set by call CashManager.discoverDevices method with reaction to event .
      io.reactivex.Single<java.lang.Boolean> isInitialized()
      Method returns boolean state, if cash drawer is initialized. Basically it means, that CashManager.getSelectedExtension and CashManager.getSelectedDevice return some value and CashManager.discoverDevices was properly called.

      io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.erp.PinValidity> validatePin()
      Perform validation of cashier's pin on backend. Return result of validation. Returns object PinValidity which contains de.wirecard.epos.mswitch.model.erp.PinValidityStatus as result of validation.

      • discoverDevices

        de.wirecard.rxparallel.SingleParallel<de.wirecard.epos.extension.drawer.CashDrawerDevice,de.wirecard.epos.util.events.Event> discoverDevices()

        This method is used for scanning of all available devices which are connected to device and selecting one of them

      • openDrawer

        io.reactivex.Completable openDrawer()

        Perform opening of cash drawer on selected device.

      • openDrawer

        io.reactivex.Completable openDrawer()
        See Also:
        CashManager.openDrawer

      • isInitialized

        io.reactivex.Single<java.lang.Boolean> isInitialized()

        Method returns boolean state, if cash drawer is initialized. Basically it means, that CashManager.getSelectedExtension and CashManager.getSelectedDevice return some value and CashManager.discoverDevices was properly called.

        See Also:
        CashManager.getSelectedExtension, CashManager.getSelectedDevice, CashManager.discoverDevices

      • getSelectedExtension

        io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.extension.drawer.EposCashDrawerExtension> getSelectedExtension()

        Method returns actual selected extension. Extension can be set by call CashManager.discoverDevices method with reaction to event .

        Returns:
        selected extension or null
        See Also:
        CashManager.discoverDevices

      • getSelectedDevice

        io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.extension.drawer.CashDrawerDevice> getSelectedDevice()

        Method returns actual selected cash drawer. Cash Drawer can be set by call CashManager.discoverDevices method with reaction to event .

        Returns:
        selected terminal or null
        See Also:
        CashManager.discoverDevices

        io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.cashregisters.CashRegister> updateCashRegister()

        Automatically calls getCashRegister, with returned cash register update call is executed. Return updated CashRegister
